name: Cellophane Invasion
description:
Fight off the invasion and keep the space between the enemies and your base structure above 0!

Instructions

Movement: WASD or arrow keys

Fire: Left click or space bar

Select weapon: Use the 1, 2 or 3 keys to switch, or click the desired weapon on the hud.

How to Win or Lose:

To win, you destroy all enemies on the final wave.

If an enemy gets to your base structure (the small grey building at the end of the road next to where you've spawned), you lose.

Assets

Made with assets from various people over at OpenGameArt.org.

Attribution and license information for each asset can be found here.
